entry.def: Ham is meat from the top of the back leg of a pig, specially treated so that it can be kept for a long period of time.
A ham is a person whose hobby consists of using special radio equipment to talk to other people with the same hobby, often people who are in other countries.

example.ex: I became a ham radio operator at the age of eleven.
example.tran: 我在11岁时成了一名业余无线电操作员。

entry.tran: 蹩脚演员;表演过火的演员
entry.def: A ham actor is someone who acts badly, exaggerating every emotion and gesture.

entry.tran: （常指演员故意地）表演过火，夸张做作
entry.def: If actors or actresses ham it up, they exaggerate every emotion and gesture when they are acting, often deliberately because they think that the audience will be more amused.

example.ex: Thrusting themselves into the spirit of the farce, they ham it up like mad.
example.tran: 他们全力投入到这部闹剧中去，极尽搞怪之能事。

means.word_mean: 1. poor acting by a ham actor

auth_sentence.content: Jake Gyllenhaal's cowboy in Brokeback Mountain melted hearts, so why is he hamming it up now?
auth_sentence.res_content: Jake Gyllenhaal's cowboy in Brokeback Mountain melted hearts, so why is he hamming it up now?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jake Gyllenhaal's cowboy in Brokeback Mountain melted hearts, so why is he hamming it up now?

auth_sentence.content: I even wonder if Mr Osborne was hamming up the croaks, gulps and grasping for water, for dramatic effect.
auth_sentence.res_content: I even wonder if Mr Osborne was hamming up the croaks, gulps and grasping for water, for dramatic effect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I even wonder if Mr Osborne was hamming up the croaks, gulps and grasping for water, for dramatic effect.

auth_sentence.content: He might have been hamming it up a bit, but Mallon was a big man and he'd hit the little pickpocket very hard.
auth_sentence.res_content: He might have been hamming it up a bit, but Mallon was a big man and he'd hit the little pickpocket very hard.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He might have been hamming it up a bit, but Mallon was a big man and he'd hit the little pickpocket very hard.
